Technique: CARVED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; FORMED BY HAND
Name: Necklace of bone disc beads & shell strips
Description: Bracelet of shell strips and necklace of bone disc-beads. The material and forms of these ornaments are typical of non-Egyptian nomads from the southeastern deserts, peoples used by the Pharaonic administration as policing officials in the Middle and New Kingdoms.
